system.simplyskills.unlock: §6You have unlocked a specialisation. Re-open the skill tree to see your specialisation tab.
effect.simplyskills.berserking.desc: Grants stacking offensive buffs each time you hit an enemy.
effect.simplyskills.bloodthirsty.desc: Recover HP when you defeat an enemy.
effect.simplyskills.elemental_arrows.des: Your next fully charged bow attack fires homing arrows infused with elemental magic.
effect.simplyskills.rampage.desc: Grants you random buffs when you take damage.
effect.simplyskills.arrow_rain.desc: Your next fully charged bow attack calls down a rain of arrows at the target location.
effect.simplyskills.arcane_volley.desc: Periodically fire Arcane bolts at your target.
effect.simplyskills.frost_volley.desc: Periodically fire Frost bolts at your target.
effect.simplyskills.meteoric_wrath.desc: Periodically summon meteors above nearby hostiles.
effect.simplyskills.immobilize.desc: Inflicts damage and slowness when attempting to move.
effect.simplyskills.arcane_attunement.de: Grants 2% Arcane Spell Power per stack.
effect.simplyskills.soul_attunement.desc: Grants 2% Soul Spell Power per stack.
effect.simplyskills.holy_attunement.desc: Grants 2% Healing Spell Power per stack.
effect.simplyskills.fire_attunement.desc: Grants 2% Fire Spell Power per stack.
effect.simplyskills.frost_attunement.des: Grants 2% Frost Spell Power per stack.
effect.simplyskills.lightning_attunement: Grants 2% Lightning Spell Power per stack.
effect.simplyskills.precision.desc: Grants 2% Spell critical damage and critical chance per stack.
effect.simplyskills.death_mark.desc: Healing and Resistance reduced by %25 per stack.
effect.simplyskills.marksman.desc: Your next fully charged bow attack fires a marksman arrow.
effect.simplyskills.stealth.desc: Grants total invisibility. Effect ends when receiving or dealing damage.
effect.simplyskills.might.desc: Grants 10% increased Melee Damage per stack.
effect.simplyskills.exhaustion.desc: Lose 1% attack damage, attack speed, and move speed per stack.
effect.simplyskills.barrier.desc: Completely negate the next incoming damage.
effect.simplyskills.soulshock.desc: Grants +1 Soul & Lightning Spell Power per stack.
effect.simplyskills.spellforged.desc: Grants +0.25 to all Spell Power per stack.
Periodically cast Judgement on nearby hostiles.
effect.simplyskills.consecration.desc: Consecrate the ground beneath your feet.
effect.simplyskills.taunted.desc: Only capable of targeting the taunting entity.
effect.simplyskills.undying.desc: You cannot drop below 1HP. If you are below 65% HP when the effect ends, take fatal damage.
effect.simplyskills.rage.desc: Gain 0.5% attack damage, attack speed, and damage received per stack.
effect.simplyskills.overload.desc:
Grants you 75% increased spell crit damage & 10% spell crit chance per stack.
Upon exceeding 5 stacks you overload, dealing significant damage to yourself and nearby enemies.

The damage dealt to enemies is scaled by your max HP and Soul spell power.
effect.simplyskills.bladestorm.desc: Causes daggers to rotate around you, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Each stack of Bladestorm increases its attack frequency and grants you 1% additional evasion chance.
effect.simplyskills.anointed.desc: Melee attacks heal nearby allies, and deal AoE damage scaling with your Healing spell power.
effect.simplyskills.vitality_bond.desc: HP synchronised with the other affected entity.
effect.simplyskills.marksmanship.desc: Grants 10% increased Ranged Damage per stack.
effect.simplyskills.agile.desc: Grants 5% increased attack speed, movespeed, spell haste, and ranged damage per stack.
effect.simplyskills.bone_armor.desc: Grants 10% increased armor & armor toughness per bone. A bone is lost when hit
effect.simplyskills.righteous_hammers.de: Grants 2% increased melee damage per hammer and damages nearby enemies.
item.simplyskills.gracious_manuscript.to: and grants you a large amount
This is only obtainable in creative.
item.simplyskills.skill_chronicle.toolti: §7freely, as long as you have no
text.autoconfig.simplyskills.title: Simply Skills
text.autoconfig.simplyskills.option.clie: Enable the Ascendancy Skill Tree

Enabled by default, the Ascendancy tree is
unlocked after spending the maximum points in
the base skill tree, and allows long-term progression.
Reset skill trees on death

Resets all Simply Skills skill trees upon death. 
This erases all points and experience invested.
Disable Default Puffish Skill trees

Disables the default 'Mining' & 'Combat' trees that come
packaged with Puffish Skills.
Enable build sharing

Enables players to use Skill Chronicles made
by other players.
Skill Chronicle Cooldown
The cooldown time for the Skill Chronicle item, in ticks (20 ticks = 1 second).
Remove unlock restrictions

Allows Specialisations to be unlocked without 
pathing to them in the skill tree.
Also allows unlocking more than one specialisation.

Not recommended, except for very particular use-cases.
Spell Haste Cooldown Reduction Modifier

Controls how heavily Spell Haste impacts cooldowns.
A higher value means Spell Haste will further reduce cooldowns.
Minimum achievable cooldown (in seconds)
Limits how short a duration can be reduced to via Spell Haste.
Minimum time between ability use (in seconds)

Limits how often a client can request an ability use from the server.
 Setting this too low may allow for packet spam and impact server performance.
HUD X offset
X Offset of Signature Ability HUD in pixels.
HUD Y offset
Y Offset of Signature Ability HUD in pixels.
Enable Dynamic Damage Resistance (DDR)

Dynamic Damage resistance (DDR) is used to mitigate player powercreep in a setting
where many mods might be interacting in ways that lead to ridiculous damage numbers.

DDR works by reducing the damage an entity receives when DPS relative to their maxHP
exceeds a certain threshold.
Enable DDR Debug Log
Provides a log output of DDR analytics.
DDR Health Requirement
The max HP an entity must have in order to benefit from DDR.
DDR Health Threshold
The percent of maxHP an entity must suffer in damage in order to benefit from DDR.
DDR Amount
The base amount of damage mitigation provided by DDR (Higher is more mitigation).
DDR AttackSpeed Weight
The influence that high attack speed has on DDR (Higher is more mitigation).
DDR Also affects players
Allows DDR to affect players. Useful when needed in PvP.
Enable Dynamic Attribute Scaling (DAS)

Dynamic Attribute Scaling causes entities attacked by the player to gain increased
attributes depending on the amount of points invested into the skill tree.
DAS can be used on its own, or alongside Dynamic Damage Resistance.

VALUES ARE VERY SENSITIVE!
DAS Max Health
The amount of health to add (multiplied by skill points spent)
DAS Attack
The amount of attack to add (multiplied by skill points spent)
DAS Armor
The amount of armor to add (multiplied by skill points spent)
DAS Armor Toughness
The amount of armor toughness to add (multiplied by skill points spent)
DAS Movespeed
The amount of movespeed to add (multiplied by skill points spent)
DAS Knockback Resistance
The amount of knockback resistance to add (multiplied by skill points spent)

text.skills.hardy.title:
§7§a[Hardy]§7
When taking damage, gain regeneration for a duration equal to the damage received.
text.skills.initiateSlowfall.title: §7§a[Innate Slowfall]§7
text.skills.initiateSlowfall.description: §7When falling long distances you gain Slow Falling.
text.skills.fervour.title: §7§a[Fervour]§7
text.skills.fervour.description: §7Landing a killing blow grants you haste for a short duration.
text.skills.wayfarerStealth.title: §7§a[Stealth]§7
text.skills.wayfarerStealth.description:
§7Gain Stealth when crouching.

§f(Stealth)§7 causes you to blend into the shadows, avoiding monster detection completely. Dealing or Receiving damage removes stealth.
text.skills.wayfarerSneak.title: §7§a[Sneak]§7
text.skills.wayfarerSneak.description:
§7Gain speed when crouching. Sneaking while you have Stealth grants you increasing stacks of Might.

§f(Might)§7 grants §a+10% §f[x]§7 increased attack damage per stack.
text.skills.wayfarerReflexive.title: §7§a[Reflexive]§7
text.skills.wayfarerReflexive.descriptio:
§7When your Stealth is forcefully broken, you have a chance to trigger the Rogue Evasion Mastery signature ability.

When your stealth is broken by attacking, gain Might and Marksmanship.

§f(Marksmanship)§7 grants §a+10% §f[x]§7 increased ranged damage per stack.

§f(Might)§7 grants §a+10% §f[x]§7 increased attack damage per stack.
text.skills.wayfarerUnseen.title: §7§a[Unseen]§7
text.skills.wayfarerUnseen.description:
§7While loading a Crossbow, gain momentary Stealth.
If you already have stealth, you instead gain Marksmanship.

§f(Marksmanship)§7 grants §a+10% §f[x]§7 increased ranged damage per stack.
text.skills.wayfarerGuarding.title: §7§a[Guarding]§7
text.skills.wayfarerGuarding.description:
§7While you have a Crossbow in your offhand, you periodically gain Barrier.

§f(Barrier)§7 The next damage you take is completely negated.
text.skills.wayfarerQuickfire.title: §7§a[Quickfire]§7
text.skills.wayfarerQuickfire.descriptio:
§7When using a bow, firing fully charged arrows in quick succession grants you stacking Marksmanship.

§f(Marksmanship)§7 grants §a+10% §f[x]§7 increased ranged damage per stack.
text.skills.initiateNullification.title: §7§a[Nullification]§7
text.skills.initiateGambit.title: §7§a[Gambit]
text.skills.initiateGambit.description: §7Your spell damage is reduced by §c25% §f[x]§7, but your spell critical damage is increased by §a+75% §f[x]§7.
text.skills.initiateEmpower.title: §7§a[Empower]§7
text.skills.initiateEmpower.description:
§7Chance on spell cast to gain a stack of Attunement.

§f(Attunement)§7 Increases spell damage for a specific school of magic by §a+2% §f[x]§7 per stack.
text.skills.initiateAttuned.title: §7§a[Attuned]§7
text.skills.initiateAttuned.description:
§7When you have 5 or more stacks of attunement, periodically convert them into stacks of Precision.

§f(Precision)§7 Increases spell critical damage and critical chance by §a+2% §f[x]§7 per stack.
text.skills.initiateLightningRod.title: §7§a[Lightning Rod]§7
text.skills.initiateLightningRod.descrip:
§7During storms, you periodically gain stacks of Lightning Attunement.

§f(Lightning Attunement)§7 Increases spell damage for lightning magic by §a+2% §f[x]§7 per stack.
text.skills.initiateEldritchEnfeeblement:
§7Your spell damage is increased by §a+5% §f[x]§7, but your movespeed is decreased by §c10% §f[x]§7.

Gain a chance equal to your Spell Critical Chance to restore health on spell cast.
The amount restored scales with your Spell Critical Damage.
text.skills.initiateHasty.title: §7§a[Hasty]§7
text.skills.initiateHasty.description:
§7Your movespeed is increased by §a+15% §f[x]§7, but you are inflicted with immobilize when taking damage.

§f(Immobilize)§7 greatly slows and damages the victim when they attempt to move.
text.skills.initiatePerilousPrecision.de:
§7Your spell critical chance is increased by §a+5% §f[x]§7, but your max health is reduced by §c15% §f[x]§7.

You have a 50% chance on spell cast to gain stacking Barrier.
This chance is reduced by a percentage equal to your max health.
text.skills.cleric.title: §7§a[Cleric]§7
text.skills.cleansing.title: §7§a[Cleansing]§7
text.skills.rangerReveal.title: §7§a[Reveal]§7
text.skills.rangerTamer.title: §7§a[Tamer]§7
text.skills.rangerTamer.description: §7When your pets are near to you, they gain Regeneration & Resistance.
text.skills.rangerBonded.title: §7§a[Bonded]§7
text.skills.rangerBonded.description: §7When your pets are near to you and are more healthy than you, they exchange their health with you. Can only trigger when your pet is above 30% HP.
text.skills.rangerTrained.title: §7§a[Trained]§7
text.skills.rangerTrained.description: §7When your pets are near to you and have at least 70% HP, they gain Strength & Speed.
text.skills.rangerIncognito.title: §7§a[Incognito]§7
text.skills.rangerIncognito.description: §7When your pets are near to you and you gain Stealth, they gain Invisibility.
text.skills.rogueBackstab.title: §7§a[Backstab]§7
text.skills.rogueBackstab.description:
§7Attacking enemies from behind inflicts them with weakness.
Also, whilst in proximity to weakened enemies, you have a chance to gain Stealth for a short duration.
text.skills.warriorHeavyArmorMastery.des: §7While your armor value is above 15, you have a chance to gain Strength when hit.
text.skills.warriorMediumArmorMastery.de: §7While your armor value is below 15, you have a chance to gain Absorption when hit.
text.skills.warriorSpellbreaker.title: §7§a[Spellbreaker]§7
text.skills.warriorSpellbreaker.descript:
§7When taking damage, you have a chance to gain Spellbreaking for a short duration.

§f(Spellbreaking)§7 causes hostile spell projectiles to explode when in close proximity to you.
text.skills.warriorGoliath.title: §7§a[Goliath]§7
text.skills.warriorGoliath.description:
§7When falling long distances, gain Earthshaker.

§f(Earthshaker)§7 causes you to damage and knockback surrounding enemies when landing on the ground. This damage scales with your armor value.
text.skills.warriorHeavyWeight.title: §7§a[Heavy Weight]§7
text.skills.warriorHeavyWeight.descripti: §7Your Earthshaker effects are enhanced, causing them to deal additional damage the longer you are in the air.
text.skills.warriorBound.title: §7§a[Bound]§7
text.skills.warriorBound.description: §7After activating Earthshaker, you gain Jump Boost for a short duration.
text.skills.warriorDeathDefy.title: §7§a[Death Defy]§7
text.skills.warriorDeathDefy.description:
§7When at low HP, you gain Regeneration and Exhaustion relative to your remaining health percent.

§f(Exhaustion)§7 reduces your Melee Attack, Movement Speed, and Attack Speed by §c1% §f[x]§7 per stack.
text.skills.warriorFrenzy.title: §7§a[Frenzy]§7
text.skills.warriorFrenzy.description:
§7Gain 75% increased Melee Damage, but each time you hit an enemy you gain a stack of exhaustion.

§f(Exhaustion)§7 reduces your Melee Attack, Movement Speed, and Attack Speed by §c1% §f[x]§7 per stack.
text.skills.warriorCarnage.title: §7§a[Carnage]§7
text.skills.warriorCarnage.description:
§7While at or above 75 stacks of Rage or Exhaustion, gain Health Boost and Immobilizing Aura.

§f(Immobilizing Aura)§7 periodically inflicts nearby enemies with Immobilize.

§f(Immobilize)§7 greatly slows and damages the victim when they attempt to move.
text.skills.warriorTwinstrike.title: §7§a[Twinstrike]§7
text.skills.warriorTwinstrike.descriptio:
§7Your melee hits have a chance to strike twice.
This chance is doubled while under the effects of Health Boost.
text.skills.warriorSwordfall.title: §7§a[Swordfall]§7
text.skills.warriorSwordfall.description:
§7Your melee hits have a chance to call down a sword from the sky, dealing damage to your target and all nearby enemies.

This chance is doubled while under the effects of Might.
text.skills.berserkerpath.title: Path of the §bBerserker§7
text.skills.berserkerpath.description:
§7§a[Recklessness]§7
When your HP rises above 70% you are inflicted with pulsing weakness.

Also, when dealing or receiving damage you gain a stack of Rage.

§f(Rage)§7 Grants §a+0.5% §f[x]§7 increased melee damage, attack speed, and damage taken per stack, up to a maximum of 100 stacks.
While above 25 stacks of Rage you rapidly lose stacks of Exhaustion.§7

Hold §f[SHIFT] §7for more info:
text.skills.berserkerpath.extra_descript: §7The §bBerserker§7, is driven by an insatiable thirst for destruction and a complete disregard for their own safety. They are masters of §amelee combat§7 and revel in dealing devastating damage, even if it means §aputting their own life on the line§7.
text.skills.berserkerSwordMastery.title: §7§a[Sword Mastery]§7
text.skills.berserkerSwordMastery.descri: §7Gain pulsing Speed when wielding a sword in your mainhand.
text.skills.berserkerSwordMasteryProfici: §7Gain increased pulsing Speed when wielding a sword in your mainhand.
text.skills.berserkerSwordMasterySkilled:
§7When not dual wielding, gain pulsing Might.

§f(Might)§7 grants §a+10% §f[x]§7 increased attack damage per stack.
text.skills.berserkerAxeMastery.title: §7§a[Axe Mastery]§7
text.skills.berserkerAxeMastery.descript: §7Gain pulsing strength when wielding an axe in your mainhand.
text.skills.berserkerAxeMasteryProficien: §7Gain increased pulsing strength when wielding an axe in your mainhand.
text.skills.berserkerAxeMasterySkilled.d: §7Gain increased pulsing strength when wielding an axe in your mainhand.
text.skills.berserkerIgnorePain.title: §7§a[Ignore Pain]§7
text.skills.berserkerIgnorePain.descript: §7When your HP drops below 40% you gain pulsing resistance.
text.skills.berserkerIgnorePainProficien: §7When your HP drops below 40% you gain increased pulsing resistance.
text.skills.berserkerIgnorePainSkilled.d: §7When your HP drops below 40% you gain increased pulsing resistance.
text.skills.berserkerRecklessness.title: §7§a[Recklessness]§7
text.skills.berserkerRecklessness.descri:
§7When your HP rises above 70% you are inflicted with pulsing weakness.

Also, when dealing or receiving damage you gain a stack of Rage.

§f(Rage)§7 Grants §a+0.5% §f[x]§7 increased melee damage, attack speed, and damage taken per stack, up to a maximum of 100 stacks.
While above 25 stacks of Rage you rapidly lose stacks of Exhaustion.
text.skills.berserkerChallenge.title: §7§a[Challenge]§7
text.skills.berserkerChallenge.descripti: §7Gain a stack of haste for each nearby enemy.
text.skills.berserkerExploit.title: §7§a[Exploit]§7
text.skills.berserkerExploit.description: §7Hitting immobilized enemies inflicts them with weakness.
text.skills.bulwarkPath.title: Path of the §bBulwark§7
text.skills.bulwarkShieldMastery.title: §7§a[Shield Mastery]§7
text.skills.bulwarkShieldMastery.descrip: §7Gain weakness & resistance when wielding a shield.
text.skills.bulwarkShieldMasteryProficie: §7Gain weakness & increased resistance when wielding a shield.
§7Gain weakness & increased resistance when wielding a shield.
text.skills.bulwarkRebuke.title: §7§a[Rebuke]§7
text.skills.bulwarkRebuke.description: §725% Chance on block to inflict your attacker with weakness.
text.skills.wayfarerSlender.title: §7§a[Slender]§7
text.skills.wayfarerSlender.description:
§7Gain Agile. The less armor you have, the greater the stacks of Agile gained.

§f(Agile)§7 grants §a+5% §f[x]§7 increased attack speed, movespeed, spell haste, and ranged damage per stack.
text.skills.roguePath.title: Path of the §bRogue§7
text.skills.roguePath.description:
§7
§7§a[Slender]§7
§7Gain Agile. The less armor you have, the greater the stacks of Agile gained.

§f(Agile)§7 grants §a+5% §f[x]§7 increased attack speed, movespeed, spell haste, and ranged damage per stack.§7

Hold §f[SHIFT] §7for more info:
text.skills.roguePath.extra_description: §7The §bRogue§7 is a master of §astealth§7 and subterfuge. They thrive in the shadows, utilizing their exceptional skills to remain unseen and catch their enemies off guard with §aprecision strikes§7. If caught in the open, they are more than capable of §aevading§7 enemy attacks and escaping back to the safety of the shadows.
text.skills.rogueSmokeBomb.title: §7§a[Smoke Bomb]§7
text.skills.rogueSmokeBomb.description:
§7Chance to blind nearby enemies and gain Immobilizing Aura when hit.

§f(Immobilizing Aura)§7 periodically inflicts nearby enemies with Immobilize.
text.skills.rogueOpportunisticMastery.de: §7Attacking while under the effects of Stealth causes you to poison your target for a short duration.
text.skills.rogueOpportunisticMasteryPro: §7Attacking while under the effects of Stealth causes you to poison your target for a moderate duration.
text.skills.rogueOpportunisticMasterySki: §7Attacking while under the effects of Stealth causes you to poison your target for a long duration.
text.skills.rogueEvasionMastery.title: §7§a[Evasion Mastery]§7
text.skills.rogueEvasionMastery.descript: §7While you have at least 1 stack of Agile, you have a 15% Chance to completely avoid incoming damage.
text.skills.rogueEvasionMasteryProficien: §7While you have at least 1 stack of Agile, you have a 20% Chance to completely avoid incoming damage.
text.skills.rogueEvasionMasterySkilled.d: §7While you have at least 1 stack of Agile, you have a 25% Chance to completely avoid incoming damage.
text.skills.rogueExploitation.title: §7§a[Exploitation]§7
text.skills.rogueExploitation.descriptio:
§7While under the effects of stealth, your back attacks inflict Death Mark.

§f(Death Mark)§7 Reduces the victims resistance and healing by §c+25% §f[x]§7 per stack.
text.skills.rogueRecovery.title: §7§a[Recovery]§7
text.skills.rogueRecovery.description: §7When you gain Stealth, you also gain Regeneration.
text.skills.rogueShadowVeil.title: §7§a[Shadow Veil]§7
text.skills.rogueShadowVeil.description: §7While under the effects of Stealth, you periodically gain increasing Resistance.
text.skills.rogueDeflection.title: §7§a[Deflection]§7
text.skills.rogueDeflection.description: §7When dual wielding weapons §f(axes do not count)§7, the base evasion chance of your Evasion Mastery passive is increased by 10%.
text.skills.rogueFleetfooted.title: §7§a[Fleetfooted]§7
text.skills.rogueFleetfooted.description: §7When you are forcefully removed from Stealth, you gain momentary Speed.
text.skills.rangerPath.title: Path of the §bRanger§7
text.skills.rangerPath.description:
§7§a[Slender]§7 
§7Gain Agile. The less armor you have, the greater the stacks of Agile gained.

§f(Agile)§7 grants §a+5% §f[x]§7 increased attack speed, movespeed, spell haste, and ranged damage per stack.§7

Hold §f[SHIFT] §7for more info:
text.skills.rangerPath.extra_description: §7The §bRanger§7 is renowned for their unparalleled §aproficiency with bows§7 and their unique ability to infuse §aelemental magic§7 into their ranged attacks. They also share a deep, symbiotic bond with their §aanimal companions§7, making them a formidable force on the battlefield.
text.skills.initiateFrail.title: §7§a[Frail]§7
text.skills.initiateFrail.description:
§7You cannot effectively use weapons with more than 6 attack power.

Gain Agile. The less armor you have, the greater the stacks of Agile gained.

§f(Agile)§7 grants §a+5% §f[x]§7 increased attack speed, movespeed, spell haste, and ranged damage per stack.
text.skills.initiateWhisperedWizardry.de:
§7Casting a spell while you have Stealth grants you several stacks of Spellforged for a few seconds.

§f(Spellforged)§7 grants §a+0.25 §f[x]§7 Spell Power per stack.
text.skills.initiateSpellcloak.title: §7§a[Spellcloak]§7
text.skills.initiateSpellcloak.descripti:
§7Casting a spell grants you brief Stealth, as long as you aren't currently Revealed.

§f(Stealth)§7 causes you to blend into the shadows, avoiding monster detection completely. Dealing or Receiving damage removes stealth.
text.skills.initiateOverload.title: §7§a[Overload]§7
text.skills.initiateOverload.description:
§7Casting a spell grants you a stack of Overload for a short duration.

§f(Overload)§7 grants you §a+45% §f[x]§7 increased spell crit damage & §a+10% §f[x]§7 spell crit chance per stack.
Upon exceeding 5 stacks you overload, dealing significant magic damage to yourself and nearby enemies.

The damage dealt to enemies is scaled by your max HP and Soul spell power.
text.skills.crusaderPath.title: Path of the §bCrusader§7
text.skills.crusaderPath.description:
§e[Requires §nPaladins & Priests§r§e to be installed]§7

Hold §f[SHIFT] §7for more info:
text.skills.crusaderPath.extra_descripti: §7The §bCrusader§7, is often chosen by those who are not content with merely §adefending their allies§7 but also strive to be a beacon of hope on the battlefield. They combine the fervor of a §ahealer§7 with the might of a §awarrior§7, making them formidable champions in both §aoffense and defense§7.
text.skills.frostguardPath.title: Path of the §bFrostguard§7
text.skills.spellbladePath.title: Path of the §bSpellblade§7
text.skills.spellbladePath.extra_descrip: §7The §bSpellblade§7 is a versatile and formidable warrior who seamlessly melds the power of magic with martial combat. Their hallmark is the fusion of §aspellcasting§7 and §amelee attacks§7, making them an exceptional force on the battlefield.
text.skills.spellbladeWeaponExpert.title: §7§a[Weapon Expert]§7
text.skills.spellbladeWeaponExpert.descr:
§7Gain a stack of Might when casting a spell. Occasionally gain a stack of Spellforged as well.

§f(Might)§7 grants §a+10% §f[x]§7 increased attack damage per stack.

§f(Spellforged)§7 grants §a+0.25§7 Spell Power per stack.
text.skills.spellbladeSpellweaving.title: §7§a[Spellweaving]§7
text.skills.spellbladeSpellweaving.descr: §7You now have a 15% chance to summon a random spell when you hit an enemy.
text.skills.spellbladeSignatureElemental:
Grants you Elemental Surge for 15s.

§f(Elemental Surge)§7 causes you to periodically release elemental novas.

§a30s Cooldown§7

§7Removes Frost Novas from your §6[Elemental Surge]§7 spell pool.
If no elements remain in the spell pool, Elemental Surge will instead release Arcane Novas.

§7Removes Fire Novas from your §6[Elemental Surge]§7 spell pool.
If no elements remain in the spell pool, Elemental Surge will instead release Arcane Novas.
§7Hitting enemies while you have §6[Elemental Surge]§7 has a 15% chance to extend the its duration by 3 seconds.

§7Removes Lightning Novas from your §6[Elemental Surge]§7 spell pool.
If no elements remain in the spell pool, Elemental Surge will instead release Arcane Novas.

Causes you to dash forward with extreme power, releasing elemental explosions as you move.

§a30s Cooldown§7
§7Your §6[Elemental Impact]§7 now pulls nearby enemies into the path of impact.
§7Your §6[Elemental Impact]§7 now also grants you brief resistance.
text.skills.spellbladeSignatureSpellweav:
Doubles the chance of your Spellweaving passive for 25s.

§a40s Cooldown§7
§7Your Spellweaving procs now grant you 5s of Haste stacking up to 5 times.
§7Your Spellweaving procs now have a 50% chance to grant you regeneration for 5s.
text.skills.wizardPath.title: Path of the §bWizard§7
text.skills.wizardPath.description:
§7§a[Frail]§7
§7You cannot effectively use weapons with more than 6 attack power.

Gain Agile. The less armor you have, the greater the stacks of Agile gained.

§f(Agile)§7 grants §a+5% §f[x]§7 increased attack speed, movespeed, spell haste, and ranged damage per stack.§7

Hold §f[SHIFT] §7for more info:
text.skills.wizardPath.extra_description: §7The §bWizard§7 specialization is for those who seek to harness the power of magics. They are relentless and destructive §aspellcasters§7, capable of unleashing cataclysmic magical energy upon their enemies. However, their lust for power over the arcane leads them to §aneglect their physical form§7, weakening their defences and physical offence capabilities.
text.skills.shamanPath.title: Path of the §bShaman§7
text.skills.clericPath.title: Path of the §bCleric§7
text.skills.clericPath.description:
§e[Requires §nPaladins & Priests§r§e to be installed]§7

Hold §f[SHIFT] §7for more info:
text.skills.clericPath.extra_description: §7Those of the §bCleric§7 specialisation are known for their unwavering commitment to safeguarding and nurturing their allies. They possess a unique combination of §ahealing§7, §asupport§7, and the ability to §abear the burdens§7 of those they protect.
text.skills.necromancerPath.title: Path of the §bNecromancer§7
text.skills.wizardPassiveSpellEcho.title: §7§a[Spell Echo]§7
text.skills.wizardPassiveSpellEcho.descr: §7Your spell hits have a chance to echo, casting an additional random spell at the target.
§7
Calls down meteors on nearby enemies.

§8[Requires Nearby Targets]

§a40s Cooldown§7
text.skills.wizardSignatureMeteorShowerG:
§7§6[Meteor Shower]§7 Now summons a single larger meteor that deals significantly more damage in a larger area.

§8[Requires Target]
text.skills.wizardSignatureMeteorShowerW:
§7Casting §6[Meteor Shower]§7 now grants you 10 stacks of Meteoric Wrath.

§f(Meteoric Wrath)§7 periodically summons meteors above nearby enemies.
text.skills.wizardSignatureMeteorShowerR: §7When Meteoric Wrath triggers it has a 10% chance to not consume a stack.
§7When Meteoric Wrath triggers it has a 30% chance to not consume a stack.
§7When Meteoric Wrath triggers it has a 50% chance to not consume a stack.
text.skills.wizardSignatureIceComet.desc:
§7
Calls down an Ice Comet that deals damage to and slows enemies in a large radius.

§a30s Cooldown§7
§7Casting §6[Ice Comet]§7 now causes you to leap backwards and gain momentary slow falling.
text.skills.wizardSignatureIceCometVolle:
§7Casting §6[Ice Comet]§7 now grants you 6 stacks of frost volley.

§f(Frost Volley)§7 causes you to periodically summon Frost Bolts at nearby or targeted enemies.
text.skills.wizardSignatureIceCometDamag: §7§6[Ice Comet]§7 Is now larger and deals more damage & knockback.
§7§6[Ice Comet]§7 Is now larger and deals much more damage & knockback.
§7§6[Ice Comet]§7 Is now larger and deals significantly more damage & knockback.
text.skills.wizardSignatureStaticDischar: Signature Ability: §6[Static Discharge]§7

§7
Releases a high damage electrical discharge at your target, inflicting them with weakness.

§8[Requires Target]

§a35s Cooldown§7
§f[Ball Lightning]

§6[Static Discharge]§7 no longer leaps, but instead summons a slow-moving ball of lightning that periodically discharges electricity at nearby hostiles.

All passives that would usually activate from a leap, now activate when the Lightning Ball discharges at enemies.
§f[Leap]
§7Your §6[Discharge]§7 can now leap between nearby enemies.
§f[Leap +]
§7Your §6[Static Discharge]§7 gains additional leaps before expiring.
§f[Leap ++]
§7Your §6[Static Discharge]§7 gains significantly more leaps before expiring.
§f[Speed]
§7Each time §6[Static Discharge]§7 leaps or is cast, you have a 5% chance to gain speed.
§f[Speed +]
§7Each time §6[Static Discharge]§7 leaps or is cast, you have a 10% chance to gain speed.
§f[Speed ++]
§7Each time §6[Static Discharge]§7 leaps or is cast, you have a 15% chance to gain speed.
§f[Lightning Orb]

§7In addition to gaining speed, you also have a chance to summon a Lightning Orb that orbits you erratically, dealing damage to enemies it passes through.

For each Lightning Orb in your vicinity, gain a stack of Soulshock.

§f(Soulshock)§7 grants you §a+1 §f[x]§7 Soul & Lightning spell power per stack.
§f[On Hit]
§7Your Lightning Orb hits can now activate on-cast spell effects, such as Spell Echo.
text.skills.wizardSignatureArcaneBolt.de:
§7
Fires a concentrated bolt of arcane energy at your target.

§a35s Cooldown§7
text.skills.wizardSignatureArcaneBoltLes: §7Your §6[Arcane Bolt]§7 now fires a Lesser Arcane Bolt that deals less damage and causes chain reactions.
text.skills.wizardSignatureArcaneBoltVol:
§7Casting §6[Arcane Bolt]§7 now grants you 10 stacks of Arcane Volley. 
 
§f(Arcane Volley)§7 causes you to rapidly cast Lesser Arcane Bolts at targeted enemies.
text.skills.wizardSignatureArcaneBoltGre: §7You now cast a §6[Greater Arcane Bolt]§7 that deals increased damage and pierces.
text.skills.shamanSignatureAstralTotem.d:
§7Summon a Totem that periodically casts elemental comets on nearby enemies.

§a30s Cooldown§7
text.skills.shamanSignatureNovaTotemdesc:
§7Summon a Totem that periodically casts elemental novas.

§a30s Cooldown§7
text.skills.shamanSignatureBoltTotem.des:
§7Summon a Totem that periodically fires elemental bolts at nearby enemies.

§a30s Cooldown§7
text.skills.rogueSignatureEvasion.title: Signature Ability: §6[Evasion]§7
text.skills.rogueSignatureEvasion.descri:
§7
The effects of your Evasion Mastery passive are doubled for 8s.

§a25s Cooldown§7
text.skills.rogueSignatureEvasionFanOfBl:
§7§6[Evasion]§7 Now also grants you 10 stacks of Fan of Blades.

§f(Fan of Blades)§7 causes you to throw daggers at enemies in front of you.

§8[Requires Target]

§7Your Fan of Blades now also inflict enemies with Disenchantment.

§f(Disenchantment)§7 periodically strips buffs from the victim.
§7You now gain 20 stacks of Fan of Blades with increased throw frequency but decreased damage.
§7Gain two stacks of Fan of Blades on kill.

§7For each enemy hit by Fan of Blades, gain a stack of Bladestorm, up to 20 stacks.

§f(Bladestorm)§7 causes daggers to rotate around you, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
Each stack of Bladestorm increases its attack frequency and grants you 1% additional evasion chance.

§7Bladestorm now has a chance to siphon health when it hits.

§f(Bladestorm)§7 causes daggers to rotate around you, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
Each stack of Bladestorm increases its attack frequency and grants you 1% additional evasion chance.
text.skills.rogueSignaturePreparation.de:
§7
Gain Stealth and Speed 3 for 8s.

§a10s Cooldown§7
text.skills.rogueSignaturePreparationSha: §7§6[Preparation]§7 now causes you to dash forward at lightning speed, dealing mainhand damage to enemies in your path.

§7You steal buffs from enemies caught within the path of your dash and inflict them with Death Mark.

§f(Death Mark)§7 Reduces the victims resistance and healing by §c+25% §f[x]§7 per stack.

§7§6[Preparation]§7 now grants you Barrier and cleanses you of any Revealed stacks.

§f(Barrier)§7 The next damage you take is completely negated.
text.skills.rogueSignatureSiphoningStrik:
§7
Gain 10 stacks of Siphoning Strikes.

§f(Siphoning Strikes)§7 causes you to siphon health health and strip buffs from your enemies on hit.

§a25s Cooldown§7

§7When you gain §6[Siphoning Strikes]§7 you also gain Might.

§f(Might)§7 grants §a+10% §f[x]§7 increased attack damage per stack.

§7When you gain §6[Siphoning Strikes]§7 you also gain Immobilizing Aura.

§f(Immobilizing Aura)§7 periodically inflicts nearby enemies with Immobilize.
§7Your §6[Siphoning Strikes]§7 also cleanse you of all stacks of Revealed on hit.
text.skills.rangerSignatureArrowRain.des:
§7
Gain one stack of Arrow Rain. 
 
§f(Arrow Rain)§7 causes your next fully-charged bow attack will summon a rain of arrows at the targeted area.

§a14s Cooldown§7
text.skills.rangerSignatureArrowRainElem:
§7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 is now elementally enhanced and deals additional elemental damage.
This effect is reduced when enemies are in close proximity.
§7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 now creates additional elemental arrows that home toward enemies near the impact area.
text.skills.rangerSignatureArrowRainEplo: §7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 now leaves behind proximity explosive arrows.
text.skills.rangerSignatureArrowRainVoll: §7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 now fires one additional volley.
§7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 now fires two additional volleys.
§7Your §6[Arrow Rain]§7 now fires three additional volleys.
text.skills.rangerSignatureDisengage.des:
§7
Slow nearby enemies and leap backwards.

§a15s Cooldown§7
text.skills.rangerSignatureDisengageRecu: §7§6[Disengage]§7 now heals all nearby pets to full health.
text.skills.rangerSignatureDisengageExpl:
§7§6[Disengage]§7 now grants all nearby pets Immobilizing Aura for a short duration. 

§f(Immobilizing Aura)§7 periodically inflicts nearby enemies with Immobilize.
text.skills.rangerSignatureDisengageMark:
§7Activating §6[Disengage]§7 while wielding a bow in your mainhand, now grants you Marksman. Otherwise, gain Barrier.

§f(Barrier)§7 The next damage you take is completely negated.

§f(Marksman)§7 Causes your next fully charged ranged attack to fire a marksman arrow, dealing high damage and inflicting the target with Death Mark. 

§f(Death Mark)§7 Reduces the victims resistance and healing by §c+25% §f[x]§7 per stack.
text.skills.rangerSignatureElementalArro: Signature Ability: §6[Elemental Arrows]§7

§7
Gain 5 stacks of Elemental Arrows.

§f(Elemental Arrows)§7 Causes your next fully charged ranged attack to fire several elemental arrows at enemies in the targeted area.

§a40s Cooldown§7
§f[Frost Attune]
§7Your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 will always be frost attuned.
§f[Fire Attune]
§7Your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 will always be fire attuned.
§f[Lightning Attune]
§7Your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 will always be lightning attuned.
§f[Radius]
§7The radius of your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 is increased by 2.
§f[Radius +]
§7The radius of your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 is increased by 4.
§f[Radius ++]
§7The radius of your §6[Elemental Arrows]§7 is increased by 6.
§f[Quantity]
§7You gain one additional stack of §6[Elemental Arrows]§7.
§f[Quantity +]
§7You gain two additional stacks of §6[Elemental Arrows]§7.
§f[Quantity ++]
§7You gain three additional stacks of §6[Elemental Arrows]§7.
§f[Renewal]
§7You have a 35% chance on kill to gain a stack of §6[Elemental Arrows]§7.
text.skills.necromancerSignatureEnrage.d:
§7
Send nearby minions into a frenzy, granting them speed, strength and resistance.

§a30s Cooldown§7
text.skills.necromancerSignatureSacrific:
§7
Sacrifice nearby minions, gaining a stack of strength, haste, and resistance for each minion sacrificed.

§a30s Cooldown§7
text.skills.necromancerSignatureSpectral:
§7
Damage your target and pull them towards you, inflicting them with slowness & mining fatigue.

§a30s Cooldown§7
text.skills.frostguardSignatureConjuring:
§7
Gain 6 stacks of Conjuring Strikes.

§a30s Cooldown§7
text.skills.frostguardSignatureFrostNova:
§7
Release a Frost Nova, damaging and slowing nearby enemies.

§a30s Cooldown§7
text.skills.crusaderAegis.title: §7§a[Aegis]§7
text.skills.crusaderAegis.description: §7Periodically consume stacks of exhaustion to gain a stack of Divine Protection.
text.skills.crusaderRetribution.title: §7§a[Retribution]§7
text.skills.crusaderRetribution.descript: §7Chance on shield block to cast Judgement on your attacker.
text.skills.crusaderExhaustiveRecovery.d:
§7Chance on shield block to instant-cast Flash Heal on yourself and gain several stacks of exhaustion.

§f(Exhaustion)§7 reduces your Melee Attack, Movement Speed, and Attack Speed by §c1% §f[x]§7 per stack.
text.skills.crusaderSignatureConsecratio:
§7
Gain Consecration for 15s.

§f(Consecration)§7 consecrate the ground beneath your feet, dealing damage to enemies while healing allies. Damage & Healing scales with Healing Spell Power.

§a30s Cooldown§7
Your §6[Consecration]§7 now wards away undead hostiles.

Your §6[Consecration]§7 now taunts affected hostiles.

§f(Taunted)§7 taunted enemies are forced to attack the taunting entity.

Your §6[Consecration]§7 now periodically grants nearby allies Might.

§f(Might)§7 grants §a+10% §f[x]§7 increased attack damage per stack.

Your §6[Consecration]§7 now periodically grants nearby allies Spellforged.

§f(Spellforged)§7 grants §a+0.25 §f[x]§7 Spell Power per stack.
text.skills.crusaderSignatureSacredOnsla:
§7
Charge forward. If blocking during the charge, you deal damage based on your armor value and knock back enemies.

§a15s Cooldown§7

Your §6[Sacred Onslaught]§7 heals allies it passes through, and grants them Divine Protection.

Healing scales off Healing Spell Power
Your §6[Sacred Onslaught]§7 also grants you Divine Protection for a duration.
Your §6[Sacred Onslaught]§7 also grants you Might for a duration.
Your §6[Sacred Onslaught]§7 also stuns enemies, so long as you hold block while advancing.
text.skills.crusaderSignatureHeavensmith:
§7
Call down an anvil from the heavens to crush your foes.

§a55s Cooldown§7

§6[Heavensmith's Call]§7 Now Taunts the primary target.§7

§f(Taunted)§7 taunted enemies are forced to attack the taunting entity.

§6[Heavensmith's Call]§7 Now inflicts the primary target with Death Mark.

§f(Death Mark)§7 Reduces the victims resistance and healing by §c+25% §f[x]§7 per stack.

§6[Heavensmith's Call]§7 Now grants you Divine Adjudication for a duration.§7

§f(Divine Adjudication)§7 periodically cast Judgement on nearby enemies.
§7Divine Adjudication granted to you by §6[Heavensmith's Call]§7 now cleanses stacks of Exhaustion from you when it triggers.
§7Divine Adjudication granted to you by §6[Heavensmith's Call]§7 now grants you stacks of Might when it triggers.
text.skills.clericAltruism.title: §7§a[Altruism]§7
text.skills.clericAltruism.description:
§7When wearing less than 10 points of armor, you periodically generate Spellforged stacks.

§f(Spellforged)§7 grants §a+0.25 §f[x]§7 Spell Power per stack.
text.skills.clericMutualMending.title: §7§a[Mutual Mending]§7
text.skills.clericMutualMending.descript: §7When casting a healing spell, you have a chance to also cast that spell on yourself.
text.skills.clericHealingWard.title: §7§a[Healing Ward]§7
text.skills.clericHealingWard.descriptio:
§7When casting a healing spell to grant your target Barrier.

§f(Barrier)§7 The next damage you take is completely negated.
text.skills.clericSignatureSacredOrb.des:
§7
Release an orb of holy energy that flies forward before seeking out a nearby ally.
When this orb connects with an ally, it heals them and grants you both Vitality Bond.

§f(Vitality Bond)§7 equalises the HP of the affected entities for its duration.

§a30s Cooldown§7
text.skills.clericSignatureSacredOrbSpee: §7Vitality Bond granted by your §6[Sacred Orb]§7 now also buffs the recipient with attack & movespeed, but inflicts you with Mining Fatigue.
text.skills.clericSignatureSacredOrbDebu: §7Vitality Bond granted by your §6[Sacred Orb]§7 now also causes debuffs affecting the recipient to periodically transfer to you.
text.skills.clericSignatureSacredOrbBuff: §7Vitality Bond granted by your §6[Sacred Orb]§7 now also periodically grants copies of your buffs to the recipient.
text.skills.clericSignatureDivineInterve:
§7
Call down a bolt of celestial energy from the heavens, healing your target and granting them Undying.

§8[Requires Target]

§f(Undying)§7 Infused with celestial energy, the entity cannot be killed.
However, if the entity is below 60% HP when the effect ends, they will take fatal damage.

§a45s Cooldown§7
§7Your §6[Divine Intervention]§7 also grants the target Fire Resistance for its duration.

§7Your §6[Divine Intervention]§7 also grants the target Might for its duration.

§f(Might)§7 grants §a+10% §f[x]§7 increased attack damage per stack.

§7Your §6[Divine Intervention]§7 also grants the target Spellforged for its duration.

§f(Spellforged)§7 grants §a+0.25 §f[x]§7 Spell Power per stack.
§7
Anoint your weapon with a sacred oil.

§f(Anoint Weapon)§7 causes your attacks to deal AoE holy damage, and periodically heal nearby allies.
AoE damage scales with Healing Power.

§a35s Cooldown§7
text.skills.clericSignatureAnointWeaponR: §7Your §6[Anoint Weapon]§7 now also grants you Resistance on hits.
text.skills.clericSignatureAnointWeaponU:
§7While your §6[Anoint Weapon]§7 is active, taking damage while below 30% HP has a chance to grant you Undying.

§f(Undying)§7 Infused with celestial energy, the entity cannot be killed.
However, if the entity is below 60% HP when the effect ends, they will take fatal damage.
text.skills.clericSignatureAnointWeaponC: §7While your §6[Anoint Weapon]§7 is active, you periodically cleanse yourself of debuffs.
text.skills.berserkerSignatureRampage.de:
§7
Gain Rampage for 15s.

§f(Rampage)§7 grants you random buffs each time you take damage.

§a30s Cooldown§7
text.skills.berserkerSignatureRampageCha: §7§6[Rampage]§7 now immediately grants you regeneration and resistance and causes you to barrel forward, dealing damage and knocking back enemies.
§7When your charge deals damage, you convert your stacks of Exhaustion into Strength.

§7Enemies hit by your charge are also inflicted with Immobilize. 

§f(Immobilize)§7 greatly slows and damages the victim when they attempt to move.
text.skills.berserkerSignatureBloodthirs:
§7
Gain Bloodthirsty for 20s.

§f(Bloodthirsty)§7 grants you 25% of your max health each time you defeat an enemy.

§a25s Cooldown§7

§7§6[Bloodthirsty]§7 Now grants you Might on use.

§f(Might)§7 grants §a+10% §f[x]§7 increased attack damage per stack.
§7While §6[Bloodthirsty]§7 is active, you have a chance to remove stacks of Exhaustion on hit.

§7While §6[Bloodthirsty]§7 is active, you have a chance to gain Earthshaker on hit.

§f(Earthshaker)§7 causes you to damage and knockback surrounding enemies when landing on the ground. This damage scales with your armor value.
text.skills.berserkerSignatureBerserking:
§7
Sacrifice 30% Total HP. Gain Berserking for a duration equal to the amount of hearts lost.

§f(Berserking)§7 grants you stacking offensive buffs each time you hit an enemy.

§a25s Cooldown§7
§7§6[Berserking]§7 now causes you to perform a forward leap slam, damaging and knocking back enemies at the landing location.

§7Leap Slam now also inflicts enemies with Immobilize.

§f(Immobilize)§7 greatly slows and damages the victim when they attempt to move.
§7Leap Slam now pulls nearby enemies instead of knocking them back.
text.skills.necromancerSignatureSummonin:
§7
Perform a ritual to summon forth an undead minion.

By default, this ability summons forth a §fDreadglare§7. An airborne minion that swarms its enemies and deals melee physical damage.

Minion damage scales with your Soul Spell Power. Minions inherit a portion of your max health.

Minions expire after 120s and must be re-summoned.

§a120s Cooldown§7
text.skills.necromancerNecroticFortifica: §7Minions now inherit half of your Armor & Armor Toughness attributes.
text.skills.necromancerUndeadLegion.desc: §7Your §6[Summoning Ritual]§7 now summons one additional minion.
text.skills.necromancerSummonWraith.desc:
§7Your §6[Summoning Ritual]§7 now also has a chance to summon a §fWraith§7 minion. An airborne minion that follows you closely while casting soul spells at nearby enemies.

Spells casted by your §fWraith§7 minions count as player spellcasts and benefit from any passives that trigger from such casts.
text.skills.necromancerWitherWraiths.des: §7Your §fWraith§7 minions now inflict Wither on spell hits.
text.skills.necromancerFrostWraiths.desc: §7Your §fWraith§7 minions now inflict Slowness on spell hits.
text.skills.necromancerBloodHarvest.desc: §7Your Dreadglare minions now lifesteal when attacking enemies. A portion of health stolen is also returned to you.
text.skills.necromancerGreaterDreadglare:
§7Your §6[Summoning Ritual]§7 no longer summons multiple minions and instead summons a single §fGreater Dreadglare§7.

The §fGreater Dreadglare§7 gains a bonus to all attribute inheritance and now taunts enemies that it hits.
text.skills.necromancerDeathEssence.desc:
§7Whenever a minion dies, you gain a stack of Bone Armor.

§f(Bone Armor)§7 Shield yourself in a layer of bones, granting you 10% increased Armor & Armor Toughness per bone.
Taking damage removes a layer.
text.skills.necromancerDeathWarden.title: §f[Death Warden]
text.skills.necromancerDeathWarden.descr: §7When taking damage while below 50% HP, you siphon health from nearby minions to recover.
text.skills.necromancerEnrage.title: §f[Enrage]
text.skills.necromancerEnrage.descriptio: §7When one of your minions dies, all other nearby minions gain Strength & Resistance.
text.skills.necromancerWinterborn.title: §f[Winterborn]
text.skills.necromancerWinterborn.descri:
§7For every 1 Frost Spell Power you have, gain a stack of Soulshock.

§f(Soulshock)§7 grants you §a+1 §f[x]§7 Soul & Lightning spell power per stack.
text.skills.portalSapphire.title: §7§6[Junction: §fSapphire§6]§7
text.skills.portalSapphire.description:
§7
Unlocks Junction nodes of the same type, allowing you to more easily traverse the skill tree.
text.skills.portalRuby.title: §7§6[Junction: §fRuby§6]§7
text.skills.portalRuby.description:
§7
Unlocks Junction nodes of the same type, allowing you to more easily traverse the skill tree.
text.skills.ascendancyRighteousHammers.d:
§7
Summon hammers that orbit you for a duration, dealing damage to nearby enemies and granting you 2% increased melee attack per hammer.

§6[For every 10 Ascendancy]§7
Summon one additional hammer.

§a60s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyBoneArmor.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Bone Armor]§7
text.skills.ascendancyBoneArmor.descript:
§7
Shield yourself in a layer of bones, granting you 10% increased Armor & Armor Toughness per bone.
Taking damage removes a layer.

§6[For every 10 Ascendancy]§7
Summon one additional bone.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
When your last layer of Bone Armor is removed, gain Undying and Regeneration for 8s.

§a90s Cooldown§7

§f(Undying)§7 Infused with celestial energy, the entity cannot be killed.
However, if the entity is below 60% HP when the effect ends, they will take fatal damage.
text.skills.ascendancyCyclonicCleave.des:
§7
Violently swing your weapon around yourself while moving forward, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
This attack scales with the highest of your attack, ranged, or spell attributes.

§6[For every 1 Ascendancy]§7
Increases ability damage.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
Cyclonic Cleave now pulls enemies it hits toward you.

§a25s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyMagicCircle.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Magic Circle]§7
text.skills.ascendancyMagicCircle.descri:
§7
Immobilize yourself in order to summon a magic circle beneath your feet, granting you a 30% increase to all Spell Power for 6s.

§6[For every 1 Ascendancy]§7
Increases effect duration.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
Magic Circle now also grants you Wizard's Spell Echo passive.
If you already have Spell Echo unlocked, increase its chance to occur by 10%.

§a60s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyArcaneSlash.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Arcane Slash]§7
text.skills.ascendancyArcaneSlash.descri:
§7
Focus arcane energy into your blade and perform a forward slash, releasing an arcane projectile that pierces up to 5 targets.

§6[For every 10 Ascendancy]§7
Gain +1 stack of Arcane Attunement on use.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
Arcane Slash is now larger, deals more damage, and pierces up to 10 targets.

§a16s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyAgony.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Agony]§7
text.skills.ascendancyAgony.description:
§7
Curse the nearest enemy with Agony, causing them to take additional damage every time they are hit with a spell projectile.
Lasts 8s.

§6[For every 1 Ascendancy]§7
Increases effect duration.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
When Agony triggers, it also heals the spell caster that caused the trigger.
This healing scales with your Healing Spell Power.

§a60s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyTorment.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Torment]§7
text.skills.ascendancyTorment.descriptio:
§7
Curse the nearest enemy with Torment.
While tormented, all damage the enemy would deal to you is instead redirected to them.
Lasts 8s.

§6[For every 1 Ascendancy]§7
Increases effect duration.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
In addition to tormenting your enemy, you also taunt them.

§a60s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyRapidfire.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Rapidfire]§7
text.skills.ascendancyRapidfire.descript:
§7
Enter a firing stance and let loose a flurry of arrows.
You can move freely while in this stance, but you cannot take other actions.
Requires a Bow or Crossbow in mainhand.
Lasts 6s.

§6[For every 1 Ascendancy]§7
Increases effect duration.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
Every third arrow fired now grants you a stack of Marksmanship.

§a30s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyCataclysm.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Cataclysm]§7
text.skills.ascendancyCataclysm.descript:
§7
Lock yourself in place to channel a powerful spell that causes several comets to descend along a line in front of you.

Scales with the highest of your Frost or Fire spell power attributes.
Lasts 3.5s.

§6[For every 1 Ascendancy]§7
Increases comet frequency, allowing for more comets per cast.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
For every comet summoned, gain a stack of Spellforged.

§a70s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyGhostwalk.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Ghostwalk]§7
text.skills.ascendancyGhostwalk.descript:
§7
Enter a spectral form and project yourself forward, becoming invulnerable to damage and sending souls to attack nearby enemies. 

Damage scales with Soul spell power.
Lasts 3.0s.

§6[For every 10 Ascendancy]§7
Gain +1 stack of Soulshock on use.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
You now heal for half of the damage dealt by Ghostwalk.

§a45s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancySkywardSunder.desc:
§7
Gain a stack of Barrier per stack of Might on you and charge forward, knocking back enemies and performing an upward strike, launching both you and your targets into the air before slamming them back into the ground.

This attack scales with the highest of your attack, ranged, or spell attributes.
Lasts 3.0s.

§6[For every 1 Ascendancy]§7
Increases ability damage.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
Skyward Sunder now inflicts enemies hit during the charging phase with Deathmark.

§a16s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyRighteousShield.de:
§7
While this ability is slotted, you generate a stack of §aGolden Aegis§7 whenever you block an attack. §aGolden Aegis§7 increases Healing Spell Power, Armor, and Armor Toughness by 1% per stack. Max 15 stacks.

Activating this ability consumes all stacks of §aGolden Aegis§7 to manifest a shield of holy energy that can be thrown for a variety of effects depending on the stacks consumed.

§7§bLess than 5 stacks:§7 The shield deals damage to enemies and ricochets 2 times.
§b5 Stacks:§7 The shield deals increased damage to enemies and ricochets 5 times.
§b10 Stacks:§7 The shield no longer damages enemies or ricochets and instead pierces and heals allies it passes through.
§b15 Stacks:§7 The shield is larger, deals significantly more damage, and inflicts Death Mark, but it no longer ricochets.§7

§6[For every 10 Ascendancy]§7
Increases §aGolden Aegis§7 max stacks by 1.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
While slotted, this ability now passively generates stacks of §aGolden Aegis§7.

§a6s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyChainbreaker.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Chainbreaker]§7
text.skills.ascendancyChainbreaker.descr:
§7
Immediately cleanse yourself of all negative effects and gain Might and Marksmanship.

§6[For every 10 Ascendancy]§7
+ 1 stack of Might and Marksmanship.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
Now also grants you Undying.

§a35s Cooldown§7

§f(Undying)§7 Infused with celestial energy, the entity cannot be killed.
However, if the entity is below 60% HP when the effect ends, they will take fatal damage.
